meta.author: HOUYHNHNM
meta.description: Acquires the groups from Yahoo Group search on a given page and type filtering by last time used, moderation type, archive type,
meta.sampleQuery: select * from {table} where query="yahoo" AND page="1"
select * from {table} where query="yahoo" AND type="r"
select * from {table} where query="yahoo" AND type="m" AND page="1"
select * from {table} where query="yahoo" AND type="m" AND page="1" AND mod="yes"
select * from {table} where query="yahoo" AND type="m" AND page="1" AND archive="1"
select * from {table} where query="yahoo" AND type="m" AND page="1" AND mod="no" AND archive="3"
select * from {table} where query="yahoo" AND type="m" AND page="1" AND mod="no" AND archive="3" AND activeY="1"
select * from {table} where query="yahoo" AND type="m" AND page="1" AND mod="no" AND archive="3" AND activeY="1" AND activeM="4"
